entities.name: muggles
entities.description: A group of non-magical people that wizards need to interact with.

entities.name: o.w.l.
entities.description: An Ordinary Wizarding Level exam in Muggle Studies.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story who is a wizard and has a sarcastic comment about his uncle.

entities.name: gringotts wizarding bank
entities.description: A bank that provides financial services to wizards and is currently recruiting Curse-Breakers.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: One of Harry's friends who is considering a career in banking but doesn't fancy it.

entities.name: fred weasley
entities.description: Harry's friend who has a voice that can be heard by Harry.

entities.name: curse-breakers
entities.description: A position at Gringotts Wizarding Bank that involves breaking curses and is advertised as thrilling opportunities abroad.

entities.name: arithmancy
entities.description: A subject required for the Curse-Breaker job at Gringotts Wizarding Bank.

entities.name: security trolls
entities.description: A position that Hermione is reading about in a pamphlet.

relationships.description: Gringotts Wizarding Bank is recruiting Curse-Breakers, and Harry thinks Hermione could do it.
Hermione is reading about the job of training security trolls in a pamphlet.
Fred Weasley has a voice that can be heard by Harry, and they are talking to each other.
